description:
B-PROJECT works hard at their lessons in preparation for their first concert at the Japan DOME as a 14-man squad.
With production planning going smoothly as well, everyone around them is becoming increasingly excited.
Preparations for the day of the concert are progressing steadily, but while Kitakado, Kaneshiro, Masunaga, and Fudo are announcing the concert on live TV, they receive a shocking piece of information...
Source: crunchyroll
